pl.ais.commons.bean.validation

Interface Constrainable<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - determines the type of constrainable value
    All Superinterfaces:
    VisitorAcceptor<ConstrainableVisitor<?>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstrainableProperty, ConstrainableValue

    public interface Constrainable<V>
extends VisitorAcceptor<ConstrainableVisitor<?>>
    Defines the API contract for constrainable.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Warlock, AIS.PL
